Large composite liquid oxygen tank developed by CASC (China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation) was successfully verified with engineering application test recently. it is expected to be used in the next generation launch vehicle (potentially #CZ9/#LM9, LEO 140t).  https://t.co/oyM2Up3x5U

[Crewed Mission Forecast] #Shenzhou12 spacecraft is expected to launch in 3 days on June 17. It is also expected to conduct a fast rendezvous and dock with #Tiangong space station within 6 hours after launch. 3 astronauts will stay in space for 3 months.  https://t.co/rvpWH90jVq

At around 03:00 UTC, June 11, #LM2D (#CZ2D) rocket was launched in Taiyuan with the Beijing-3 EO satellite. This commercial satellite is capable of sensing the ground optically with 0.5m resolution and short maneuver response time. The rocket also carried three mini satellites.  https://t.co/ty2OSUJWcy

Successful test for rocket recovery by large-scale controllable parafoil glider with area of 300 square meters. The test was conducted for a booster of recently launched CZ3B rocket. It ensures ground safety by accurately control the landing area, and recovers rocket at low cost.  https://t.co/F5GcZiQwI3
